name: Pipeline Documentation Sync
description: Automatically updates ARCHITECTURE.md when the core pipeline changes to keep docs in sync with code

action.message:
The core pipeline file has been updated. Please:

1. Re-read packages/shared/types.ts to check for any schema changes
2. Re-read packages/bone-framework/core/pipeline.ts to understand the latest pipeline implementation
3. Update docs/ARCHITECTURE.md to reflect:
   - Current SOP schema structure from types.ts
   - Current pipeline stages and their implementations
   - Any new methods, validation logic, or data flow changes
   - Keep the existing structure but ensure technical accuracy

Focus on keeping the "Pipeline Components" and "Universal SOP Schema" sections accurate and current.
